name: Camtasia Video File
summary: Learn about .CAMV files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NOTE: Camtasia Studio no longer uses the CAMV format for exported video. Instead, it uses .MP4 files and Flash for Web exports.

description: Video file exported by Camtasia Studio, a program used for creating screen casts; saves video that was exported for playback on the Web using RealPlayer; can be played if the Camtasia RealPlayer plug-in is installed.
